result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal)

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Juan F Perez-Perez

records.addlTxt:
10:42 AM Prosecuting Attorney Alex Huber in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Juan F Perez-Perez in court.  Attorney Zachary Caley in court for Juan F Perez-Perez. Spanish interpreter, Ruth Garcia, appeared in court. Clerk N. Nobile.
MINUTES: 22CM931/22TR4190-4191. Attorney Caley is requesting an adjournment so the DE may obtain his license which will take few months. The State does not object. Court adjourns. TR cases continue to trail.
Final pre-trial scheduled for February 6, 2023 at 01:30 pm.

Due to unavailability of court; FPT adj from 9/14 to 10/6; NTBS.   Spanish interpreter Leo Martin assisted CSM Lema with contacting deft to inform him of the new date.  No answer; voice mail message was left by interpreter Martin
Final pre-trial on October 6, 2022 at 10:30 am.
No disposition. Leave on for next scheduled court activity.
Bond modified to $500; refund excess.  jk /mg  ck#22CH090338

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt:
PROPER ATTIRE REQUIRED.  NO SHORTS OR TANK TOPS ALLOWED IN COURTROOM.
Continued Posted.
  *Not to drive w/o VALID Driver's License.

208PM   Assistant District Attorney Brenda Valdes appeared for the State.  Defendant appeared in court in person.  Spanish Interpreter Leo Martin present.  Clerk JT  Minutes:  The Court finds probable cause in this case today.  Def. is referred to the Public Defender.  If not eligible, def. to retain his own counsel. Court date will not be adjourned due to def.'s failure to retain counsel.  Plea of Not Guilty entered by the court. Pre-trial conference scheduled for August 26, 2022 at 02:00 pm.  Final pre-trial scheduled for September 14, 2022 at 01:30 pm. $500  Cash Bond Set w/conditions (see bond entry).  Refund balance.  sg
and witness list filed by the State
